description: The project provides decentralized asset management for users to diversify their investment on DeFi protocol. The project permissibility of certain portfolio depends on the vault products offered by the project. In short, the project was the same as an investment company that manage funds. Overall the project did invest in Non-Shariah coin that triggered Shariah issues.

description: Oasis Network is a layer 1 that provides a platform for open finance and a responsible data economy dApps. Overall, Oasis Network ecosystem is aligned with Shariah

For exchange tokens that act as the main token for trading purposes on the specific exchange, there are some tricky cases that need to be clarified. First, the token itself represents the ecosystem that gains profit from all transactions on the exchange that may include the Non-Shariah project Token. Second, the ecosystem benefits from derivatives contracts that clearly contrast with Shariah's ruling. We assume the same methodology of Stock Shariah screening that enacts the prohibition of stockbroking activities is applied in the same case. However, the usage of Exchange Token is commonly used to trade NFT or any other coin, thus we recommend not to hold Exchange Token for more than 30 days to avoid being involved in their ecosystem.

مشروع zkSync هو بروتوكول Layer-2 مصمم لتوسيع نطاق Ethereum عبر توفير معاملات أسرع وأرخص. يستند zkSync إلى استخدام إثباتات المعرفة الصفرية (Zero-Knowledge Proofs) لتحسين كفاءة المعاملات على البلوكشين. مع الحفاظ على قيمها الأساسية المتمثلة في اللامركزية والأمن والسيادة الذاتية. يحقق هذا البروتوكول ذلك من خلال استخدام ZK-rollups، والذي يسمح بمعالجة المعاملات خارج السلسلة ثم تجميعها معًا وإرسالها إلى Ethereum في دليل واحد. تعمل هذه الطريقة على زيادة سرعات المعاملات بشكل كبير وتقليل التكاليف دون المساس بالأمان يعمل رمز ZK كرمز أصلي للأداة المساعدة والحوكمة داخل النظام البيئي zkSync، ويلعب دورًا حاسمًا في الحفاظ على عمليات البروتوكول وتعزيزها. إحدى حالات الاستخدام الأساسية هي دفع رسوم المعاملات على شبكة zkSync. من خلال استخدام رموز ZK مقابل الرسوم

The project itself does not pose any Shariah issues. However, the rewards being distributed are in the form of USDB, which are tokens backed by real decentralized assets. Nevertheless, the specific asset serving as the backing remains undisclosed.

هو بروتوكول يتيح تداول عائد مستقبلي رمزي على نظام AMM. يهدف إلى منح مالكي الأصول المدرة للعائد الفرصة لتوليد عائد إضافي وتثبيت العائد المستقبلي مقدمًا، مع توفير تعرض المتداولين المباشر لتدفقات العائدات المستقبلية، دون الحاجة إلى ضمان أساسي. ويهدف إلى دعم العديد من البروتوكولات والأصول، مما يتيح إدارة شاملة وسهلة للعائد على نظام أساسي واحد.

WAX provides many features in its platform. The main product in this platform is a trading and minting platform for NFT or any digital assets. DeFi is another product offered by this project. Users can stake to secure the network and provide liquidity for their main token and Ethereum Interoperability token. The project does not offer any prohibited service instead all the product is neutral. The staking method by this protocol is neutral as there are no rewards involved instead users will benefit from free transactions. We conclude that WAX is Shariah Compliant.

قدمت SuperRare ملكية وحوكمة الشبكة إلى المجتمع. SuperRare 2.0 هي DAO ، وهي منظمة لامركزية تشرف على معلمات النظام الأساسي الرئيسية ، وتخصص الأموال من خزانة المجتمع ، وتصوت على التحسينات المقترحة للشبكة والبروتوكول.

هي عبارة عن منصة توزيع أفلام ومحتوى لا مركزية.
تتمثل مهمة MovieBloc في حل المشكلات التي تسببها هيمنة التكتلات على صناعة المسرح والترفيه المنزلي من خلال تقنية blockchain الخاصة بها, سيحصل منشئو المحتوى على حصة أرباح شفافة وبيانات جمهور وفرصة عرض متساوية في المقابل سيصل المشاهدون إلى أفلام ومحتوى متنوع، وسيحصلون على مكافأة مقابل تقديم مواد تنظيمية وترجمات ومواد تسويقية للمجتمع .
في فبراير 2020، استحوذت MovieBloc على خدمة “Cobak” ، وهي خدمة مجتمعية للعملات الرقمية في كوريا وخدمة متنقلة توفر محفظة تشفير ومجتمع ومؤشر في الوقت الفعلي وأخبار وإسقاط جوي وخدمات بيع رمزية.
 في مارس 2020، أنشأت MovieBloc شركة MBL Media، وهي شركة لتطوير محتوى IP وستتولى تطوير الملكية الفكرية والإنتاج وإدارة حقوق الطبع والنشر التي تركز على محتوى الرسوم المتحركة والأفلام كعملها الرئيسي.

سلسلة Ethernity هي عبارة عن نظام أساسي قائم على blockchain الاثريوم يتيح للمستخدمين الاستفادة من الشعبية المتزايدة للعملات غير القابلة للاستبدال. يضع المطورون (NFTs) كمشروع متقاطع للتمويل اللامركزي (DeFi) مع NFTs المصدق عليها في النظام البيئي لسلسلة Ethernity. كما تعمل على تهيئة الظروف لجميع الأعضاء النشطين في المجتمع لتعزيز قيمة عملة ERN الخاص به. تسعى Ethernity إلى تحقيق هدفها المتمثل في تعميم الفن الرقمي القائم على NFT ودعم القضايا الخيرية من خلال شراكات مع شخصيات بارزة في صناعات blockchain والموسيقى والترفيه.

Hooked Protocol aims to help Web2 users transition into the Web3 ecosystem. Hook proposed for streamlined and fun gamified learning mechanism, Wild-Cash app (the all-in-one Learn-to-Earn- DApp) and Web3 Onboarding Combo. Overall, Hooked Protocol are neutral.

يوفر لمستخدمي DeFi من الشبكات المزدحمة والمركزية خيار نقل أصولهم غير المستخدمة ووضعها على BENQI دون عقبات ورسوم الشبكة المنخفضة.
يسمح لمستخدمي BENQI بالوصول بسلاسة وبتكلفة معقولة إلى الخدمات المالية اللامركزية وزيادة التحكم في استراتيجياتهم.
يتمتع المطورون بخيار استخدام BENQI لإنشاء منتجات مالية باستخدام الرموز المميزة للبروتوكول والحوكمة.
يمكن لأعضاء BENQI سحب السيولة من سوق السيولة المشتركة والاقتراض من سوق السيولة والحصول على رؤية واضحة لأسعار الفائدة.

staking

Cryptocurrency staking: an Islamic finance perspective.
 Staking has become a popular way to make money in the crypto world, but how does it relate to Sharia principles? Let's figure it out:
Types of staking:
Mining on the platform, Participation in liquidity pools, Storage rewards
Shariah assessment:
Mining: prohibited on platforms with smart contracts, but may be allowed without them Liquidity pools: expressly prohibited as a form of usury
Reward for storage: prohibited due to suspicions of usury
A Important: the decision may depend on the features of a particular platform

AUDIUS is a music streaming ecosystem that combines blockchain with its system. Users can create, listen and stream any audio content with AUDIUS. The token itself acts as a utility token that allows users to participate in the ecosystem governance, such as voting and staking. We don't see any issue with how the token works. However, the ecosystem itself was built for entertainment that contains a lot of unrestricted content. Thus as a user, you have to choose your content wisely.

DYDX provide features that contradict Shariah rulings in their exchange platform. The project offers decentralized exchange for trading on the platform, spot and margin trading, and lending and borrowing features that include interest.

Upon conducting a thorough examination, it can be concluded that the Greyscale Bitcoin Trust (GBTC) fund does not contain elements that contravene the principles of Shariah. Therefore, in accordance with the Islamic legal maxim "Al-ashlu fil mu'amalah al-ibahah illa an yadulla daliilun 'ala tahrimihaa," which translates to "The fundamental principle in financial transactions is permissibility, unless there is evidence indicating its prohibition," the Greyscale Bitcoin Trust (GBTC) can be deemed a Shariah-compliant investment instrument.

Grayscale Bitcoin Trust is primarily invested in BTC, with minimal cash holdings dedicated to covering operational costs and expenses. Importantly, the ETF do not distribute interest to their investors, focusing solely on capital gains derived from BTC’s valuation. Therefore, it aligns with Shariah principles and is considered Shariah-compliant.

Upon conducting a thorough examination, it can be concluded that the Vaneck Bitcoin Trust (HODL) fund does not contain elements that contravene the principles of Shariah. Therefore, in accordance with the Islamic legal maxim "Al-ashlu fil mu'amalah al-ibahah illa an yadulla daliilun 'ala tahrimihaa," which translates to "The fundamental principle in financial transactions is permissibility, unless there is evidence indicating its prohibition," the Vaneck Bitcoin Trust (HODL) can be deemed a Shariah-compliant investment instrument.

VanEck Bitcoin Trust is primarily invested in BTC, with minimal cash holdings dedicated to covering operational costs and expenses. Importantly, the ETF do not distribute interest to their investors, focusing solely on capital gains derived from BTC’s valuation. Therefore, it aligns with Shariah principles and is considered Shariah-compliant.

Valkyrie Bitcoin Fund is to be found has an exposure to futures contracts, cash, and bonds, hence do not meet the Shariah compliance criteria due to it asset composition.

Valkyrie Bitcoin Fund is considered not in line with Shariah principles due to the involvement in the allocation of assets on futures contracts. Firstly, futures contracts involve a high degree of uncertainty (gharar) regarding the future price of the asset, which contradicts the Islamic principle of transparency and clarity in transactions. Secondly, futures contracts are often used for speculative purposes, where the primary intention is to profit from price fluctuations rather than actual ownership of the underlying asset. Islam strongly discourages such gambling-like behavior and excessive risk-taking in speculation. Lastly, in many futures contracts, the buyer does not intend to take actual delivery of the asset, leading to transactions based on something that does not physically exist at the time of the contract. This lack of underlying asset ownership is also at odds with Shariah principles. Collectively, these factors make futures contracts problematic and generally prohibited within the framework of Islamic finance.

Ethereum (ETH) 


ПРОЕКТ
Ethereum - это платформа смарт-контрактов на основе блокчейна. Смарт-контракты это компьютерные программы, которые автоматически выполняют необходимые действия для выполнения соглашения между несколькими сторонами в Интернете. Они предназначены для сокращения потребностей в посредниках, следовательно, снижения комиссий за транзакции и повышения надежности транзакций

Основной целью изобретения Ethereum была разработка
платформы, позволяющей выполнять смарт-контракты с использованием блокчейна, что значительно увеличивает существующие преимущества технологии смарт-контрактов. В дополнение к смарт-контрактам, блокчейн Ethereum способен размещать другие криптовалюты, которые называются "токенами", благодаря использованию стандарта соответствия ERC-20. На самом деле это было наиболее распространенное использование платформы ЕТН на сегодняшний день.

До сих пор было запущено более 280 000 токенов, совместимых с ERC-20, более 40 из них входят в топ-100 криптовалют по рыночной капитализации.

СЕРВИС
- Платформа смарт-контрактов
- Блокчейн для размещения других криптовалют и
децентрализованных приложений.

ИСПОЛЬЗОВАНИЕ
Он используется в качестве платы за транзакции в сети - Он используется в качестве хранилища ценностей.

ШАРИАТСКОЕ ЗАКЛЮЧЕНИЕ - ХАЛЯЛЬ (ДОЗВОЛЕНО)

"Это решение является иджтихадом, основанным на информации из официального ресурса валюты и других открытых источников, а Аллах знает лучше

Dogwifhat is a meme coin without specific use case, which raises concerns regarding their compliance with Shariah principles. Meme coins often lack clear utility or tangible benefits, making it questionable whether they meet the criteria for Shariah compliance, as they do not contribute to mutually beneficial exchanges. Additionally, meme coins are commonly associated with pump and dump activities, which can be harmful to investors' wealth. Based on these factors, we have deemed meme coins that have no use cases, including WIF, as impermissible (tahrim al-wasail).

• Connecting BTC to the world of Defi and expanding its use as loans and framing. Restore Bitcoin (BTC) by placing Bitcoin in the possession of a trusted third party to earn a return. Restocking Bitcoin is similar to depositing in banks, where you earn usurious interest on your assets.

Notcoin is similar to a meme coin without a specific use case, which raises concerns regarding their compliance with Shariah principles. Meme coins often lack clear utility or tangible benefits, making it questionable whether they meet the criteria for Shariah compliance, as they do not contribute to mutually beneficial exchanges. Additionally, meme coins are commonly associated with pump and dump activities, which can be harmful to investors' wealth. Based on these factors, we have deemed meme coins that have no use cases, including NOT, as impermissible (tahrim al-wasail).

description: . تعتبر حامليها شركاء في الشبكة او المشروع وتعود عليهم بارباح لهذا فهي تعتبر سهم مختلط والسهم المختلط الذي يدور نشاط شركته بين الحل والحرمة ... وحكمه يحرم التعامل به وفقا لقرار مجمع الفقه الاسلامي الدولي

هي عملة مشفرة صادرة عن أول بورصة عملات مشفرة في إندونيسيا تقدم نموذجًا من الرموز الهجينة أي أنه يعتبر خليط أو مزيج بين التمويل المركزي (CeFi) والتمويل اللامركزي (DeFi). حيث تم انشاؤها على شبكة بايننس (BEB-20) وأصبح أول كيان مسجل بموجب وكالة تنظيم تداول السلع الآجلة في إندونيسيا (BAPPEBTI). يخدم (TKO) عدة أغراض على منصة Tokocrypto blockchain ويسمح للمستخدمين بالمشاركة في تبادل العملات المشفرة وبرامج الإيداع والادخار وتطبيقات ( DeFi ) عبر الأنظمة الأساسية وأسواق(NFT).
Casino gambling and loans symbol رمز مقامرة كازينو و قروض

هو بروتوكول سيولة مصمم لتحسين توليد العائد من العملات المشفرة المضمونة مثل BNB وETH والعملات المستقرة والأصول الرقمية الأخرى. تعمل Lista DAO في جوهرها على نموذج ثنائي الرمز يضم lisUSD، وهي عملة مستقرة لامركزية، وLISTA، العملة المشفرة الأصلية الخاصة بها تستخدم lisUSD باعتبارها العملة المستقرة اللامركزية الأساسية، المضمونة بأصول مرهونة عبر البروتوكول يميز هذا النهج العملة lisUSD عن العملات المستقرة التقليدية من خلال الاستفادة من الأصول اللامركزية للحصول على ضمانات بدلاً من الربط بالعملات الورقية.
توفر المنصة مجموعة من الوظائف بما في ذلك التحويلات الفورية، والاقتراض، وزراعة الغلة ، وضمان الأصول تعمل هذه الميزات على تمكين المستخدمين من المشاركة بنشاط في النظام البيئي مع كسب المكافآت والحفاظ على السيولة.

عبارة عن منصة مبنية على Ethereum تشكل النظام البيئي للموسيقى الحية بالكامل تحت سقف واحد. تعمل حاليًا بمثابة IMDB للموسيقى الحية، حيث يتم تصنيف ملفات الموسيقيين وفقًا لشعبيتهم عبر الإنترنت.
وهو نظام بيئي للموسيقى الحية يعمل ربط الفنانين والمعجبين ووكالات الحجز وإدارة المواهب ومنظمي الأحداث معًا على نفس المنصة. وتقوم بإدراج ملفات تعريف لأكثر من 300000 فنان و2000 وكالة حجز و90.000 مكان و500000 حدث. وهدفها هو أن تصبح أكبر سوق للمواهب العالمية.

Tether has introduced Alloy, a new product blending traditional finance stability with digital asset innovation. 

Alloy is a digital asset known as aUSD₮, over-collateralized by Tether Gold (XAU₮), ensuring that for every unit of aUSD₮ created, a larger value of gold is held as collateral in Swiss vaults. 

This addresses the common issue of volatility in the cryptocurrency market, offering a stable alternative backed by gold. 

Alloy operates through over-collateralization, where users deposit Tether Gold into a smart contract, mint aUSD₮ based on the gold deposited, and use aUSD₮ for various transactions. 

This system provides the US dollar's utility with gold's stability, crucial for those wanting to use digital assets without worrying about sudden value drops. 

Alloy complements Bitcoin by providing a stable alternative for transactions, allowing diversification of digital asset portfolios, and encouraging mainstream adoption of digital currencies. 

Designed for secondary market liquidity, Alloy creates arbitrage opportunities when market prices deviate from the reference price. 

If aUSD₮ falls below $1, users can buy it at a discount to release their collateral, while if it exceeds $1, new users can mint and sell it to balance the supply and stabilize the price. 

However, from a Shariah perspective, aUSD₮ is not suitable for TijarX as it does not give the holder ownership of the gold per se, unlike alternatives like Ainslie or PAX Gold. 

Chief Shariyah Architect of MRHB, Mufti Billal Omarjee points out that XAU₮, the Tether Gold backing aUSD₮, is also not Shariah-compliant as there is no audit confirming a 1:1 gold reserve ratio. 

Thus, while Alloy by Tether offers innovative stability and utility, it does not meet the criteria for Shariah compliance, making it unsuitable for those seeking Shariah-compliant investment options. 

This highlights the importance of ensuring transparency and adherence to Shariah principles in the evolving landscape of digital currencies.

description: There is currently no disagreement among scholars regarding the prohibition of projects involving coins that support liquid staking, such as LDO, JTO, or RENZO—all of these are haram. Other coins involved in liquid staking also fall into the category of doubtful or questionable coins. As of now, there are no halal cryptocurrencies that support liquid staking.

FLOKI (Floki Inu) stands out from other meme tokens in that this meme coin is associated with several projects or collaborates with projects such as NowPayments, BarnBridge, and more than 1,500 products can be purchased using FLOKI tokens. When using this token for payments, a 4% fee is charged, which goes to the Floki Inu treasury. These funds are distributed for project development as we Moderator, [10.09.2024 21:37] ll as among the token holders. The technology behind this token does not exclude it from meme coins, and the services offered do not fully justify its recognition as halal. Additionally, the coin is primarily based on rewarding its investors through their financial investments in the asset. According to Dr. Muhammad Abu Jazar, this coin is considered Haram!

description: As of now, the projects run by Linea appear to be in accordance with Shariah principles. However, there is no clear information on the token use case and its rewards system. No official information regarding the token and its use cases has been issued by the team behind the project. Therefore, we consider it to be in a grey area.
Overall, the projects seem to have no Shariah issues. Howeve Moderator, [10.09.2024 21:37] r, the EIGEN token has not been launched yet and is still under development. Last Screening: Q3 2024

The issue arose when they used the Lottery word in one of their features, however, we recognize that no gambling element was involved. We stick to the Islamic legal maxim 'Matters shall be judged by their objectives'. Other features as Staking yield, NFT collateral, NFT rental are considered neutral. ALICE classified as Shariah Compliant.

Resistance Dog (REDO) — это мем-монета без конкретного варианта использования, что вызывает опасения относительно их соответствия принципам шариата. Мем-монеты часто не имеют четкой полезности или ощутимых преимуществ, что ставит под сомнение их соответствие критериям соответствия шариату, поскольку они не способствуют взаимовыгодному обмену. Кроме того, мем-монеты обычно ассоциируются с деятельностью pump and dump, которая может нанести ущерб благосостоянию инвесторов. Исходя из этих факторов, мы сочли мем-монеты, не имеющие вариантов использования, включая REDO, недопустимыми (tahrim al-wasail)

description: The projects behind this token are DEX featuring derivatives trading platforms only, which contravene Shariah principles.

Root Network is a multifunctional blockchain project. Some of the project’s services are impermissible from a Sharia perspective, while others are permissible. According to Sharia Life, the impermissible services make up a small percentage of the overall project, and therefore, the project as a whole complies with Sharia requirements. From the perspective of Crypto Islam, however, the project's services are mixed, which could make it questionable.

As of Q2 2024, many of TATSU's services have yet to be implemented, and the primary use of the token is to stake wTao and TATSU tokens with an annual return of 30%. According to Crypto Islam, the project is considered haram, while Sharia Life views the token as halal.

According to Sharia Life and Crypto Islam, the Polyhedra Network project generally complies with Sharia requirements. However, there may be issues in the future when the project launches its gaming platform. If you are investing in this token for the long term, you should conduct Sharia audits on the token more frequently.

Изначально монета GALA считалась халяльной, так как проект был создан как игровая платформа для разработчиков. Позже разработчики расширили проект, добавив платформы для фильмов и музыки, где монета GALA использовалась для оплаты услуг. На тот момент мы признали монету GALA недозволенной с точки зрения шариата. При последней проверке проекта мы узнали, что разработчики разделили платформу: теперь для оплаты на платформе, предоставляющей доступ к фильмам и музыке, используется отдельная валюта MUSIC (Gala Music). Монета GALA больше не участвует в этой платформе, и другие проекты, использующие её, соответствуют требованиям шариата. В связи с этим монета GALA снова считается халяльной. А Аллах знает лучше

We regard Zora Energy as being in a grey area in terms of Shariah compliance, given the lack of clarity surrounding its token's use case at the time of its launch. For an item to be considered al-mal, it must have a use case or provide some benefit. Without a specific utility or benefit attached, it is questionable whether it qualifies as al-mal.

SoonVerse operates within the entertainment industry, offering games. Their collaborations may potentially lead to involvement in Shariah non-compliant entertainment, particularly through games that incorporate non-compliant features.

There are several questionable aspects regarding Big Time. The Showdown Tournament rewards system lacks clarity, raising concerns about the potential inclusion of gambling elements, though this remains uncertain. Additionally, the Mystery Boxes sold in their marketplace contain elements of gharar (excessive uncertainty) and gambling, which are problematic from a Shariah perspective.
As of now, the projects run by Nexera appear to be in accordance with Shariah principles.

The 2nd Shariah Committee Meeting held at Sharlifes office on March 29, 2024, concluded that meme coins without a specific use case raise concerns regarding their Shariah compliance. These coins often lack clear utility or tangible benefits, making it questionable whether they meet the criteria for Shariah compliance, as they do not contribute to mutually beneficial exchanges. Furthermore, meme coins are frequently associated with harmful practices such as pump and dump schemes, which can negatively impact investors' wealth. As a result, meme coins without a defined use case have been deemed impermissible.
As of now, the projects run by Messier appear to be in accordance with Shariah principles.

It is a crypto currency of the Barn Bridge platform, was founded in 2019. The BarnBridge protocol was launched in September 2020 to create tradable currencies, as well as extending the functionality of decentralized finance to make it more flexible and efficient. Barn Bridge brings traditional risk management and fixed income tools to the decentralized finance market. Its main focus is to segment the digital currency risk so that market participants, depending on their risk profile, can invest in different products or currencies. The BOND token is the system governance token, it enables its holders to vote on platform updates. The BOND token is the system governance token, it enables its holders to vote on platform updates.
The MAGIC token may involve non-Shariah-compliant elements within its projects, such as certain games and tournament rewards. Therefore, we advise users to avoid engaging with the token.

Aleph Zero (AZERO) is a privacy-focused Proof-of-Stake (PoS) layer-one blockchain designed for enterprises. It was built using the Substrate stack, an open-source technology suite that enables projects to develop custom blockchains. AZERO aims to solve the speed, scalability, verification time, and security issues faced by current blockchains. AZERO selects a fixed committee of validators every fifteen minutes, meaning 96 committees are chosen every 24 hours. These committees reward network participants based on their contributions. Staking rewards for validators and candidates are proportional to the accumulated amount. However, candidates receive their rewards after deducting validator fees. Use cases of the network include the Internet of Things (IoT), smart contracts, supply chain management, virtual game assets, decentralized name system (DNS), global wallet and decentralized exchange, asset digitization, notary signing, transparent access to public documents, automatic tax payments, database, and automatic payment agreements.

Optimism and Arbitrum are Ethereum Layer 2 scaling solutions that aim to improve transaction speed and reduce costs while maintaining Ethereum's security. Arbitrum: Also uses Optimistic Rollups but focuses on developer ease and compatibility with Ethereum. It allows for faster and cheaper transactions by offloading computation and storage.

Optimism and Arbitrum are Ethereum Layer 2 scaling solutions that aim to improve transaction speed and reduce costs while maintaining Ethereum's security. Optimism: Utilizes Optimistic Rollups, bundling multiple transactions into one batch and processing them off-chain to increase efficiency. It assumes transactions are valid unless challenged.

Space ID is a Web3 project that focuses on decentralized domain name services. It allows users to create and manage unique blockchain-based identities and domain names, simplifying interaction across decentralized applications (dApps), wallets, and blockchains.

Algorand is a blockchain platform designed to offer high performance, scalability, security, and decentralization. It uses a unique Pure Proof-of-Stake (PPoS) consensus mechanism, where validators are chosen randomly based on the amount of ALGO tokens they hold.

MyShell is a decentralized platform that empowers users to create, share, and monetize AI agents within a community-driven ecosystem. It aims to democratize access to artificial intelligence by allowing individuals, regardless of their coding expertise, to develop AI applications through a user-friendly, no-code interface.

• RedStone is currently used practically and exclusively in prohibited DeFi services, such as decentralized lending, restaking, derivatives, and others. The judgment may change if it expands into other sectors.

Kaito is an innovative AI-powered platform designed to streamline information flow within the cryptocurrency and Web3 sectors. It addresses the challenge of fragmented data by aggregating and analyzing content from diverse sources, including social media, governance forums, research papers, and more. This consolidation enables users to access actionable insights efficiently, enhancing decision-making processes.

Celo is a mobile-first blockchain platform designed to make decentralized financial (DeFi) tools and services accessible to anyone with a smartphone, aiming to foster global financial inclusion.

Litecoin (LTC) is one of the earliest and most well-established cryptocurrencies, launched in 2011 by former Google engineer Charlie Lee. It was designed as a 'lighter' alternative to Bitcoin, offering faster transactions and lower fees while maintaining similar security principles.

Bitcoin Cash (BCH) is a decentralized cryptocurrency that emerged from a hard fork of Bitcoin in August 2017. The primary motivation behind its creation was to increase the block size limit, enabling the network to process more transactions per second and reduce fees, thereby enhancing its utility as a medium of exchange.

DigiByte (DGB): A Secure and Decentralized Blockchain DigiByte (DGB) is an open-source cryptocurrency and blockchain platform that was launched in January 2014. It focuses on speed, security, and decentralization, aiming to improve upon the limitations of other cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin.

Trust Wallet Token (TWT) is the native utility token of Trust Wallet, a non-custodial cryptocurrency wallet that enables users to securely store, manage, and exchange a wide range of digital assets. Launched in 2017, Trust Wallet supports over 10 million assets across more than 100 blockchains, including Bitcoin, Ethereum, Solana, and Cosmos.

Qtum is a decentralized blockchain platform that merges the security of Bitcoin's UTXO (Unspent Transaction Output) model with the flexibility of Ethereum's smart contract functionality. Launched in 2017, Qtum aims to provide a scalable and efficient platform for decentralized applications (dApps) and enterprise solutions.

Pyth Network is a decentralized blockchain oracle designed to deliver real-time, high-quality financial data to decentralized applications (dApps) and decentralized finance (DeFi) protocols. Its mission is to bridge the gap between traditional financial markets and blockchain ecosystems by providing accurate and timely market information.

PAX Gold (PAXG) is a digital asset backed by physical gold, offering investors a way to own gold bars through blockchain technology. Each PAXG token is pegged to one troy ounce of gold stored in vaults certified by the London Bullion Market Association (LBMA). (paxos.com) Key Features of PAX Gold: Easy Gold Ownership: PAXG allows investors to own gold without needing to physically store gold bars, simplifying the process of purchasing, selling, and transferring gold assets. (paxos.com) Regulated and Secure Structure: Paxos Trust Company, regulated by the New York Department of Financial Services, ensures that the physical gold backing PAXG is securely stored in trusted vaults. (paxos.com) Liquidity and Accessibility: PAXG can be easily traded on cryptocurrency exchanges, providing liquidity and accessibility for investors globally. (paxos.com)

eCash (XEC) is a cryptocurrency designed for fast, secure, and scalable transactions on the internet. It was created as a result of the rebranding of Bitcoin Cash ABC (BCHA) in July 2021, after a development team led by Amaury Séchet split from the Bitcoin Cash (BCH) blockchain. (coinmarketcap.com)

Ethena Labs is the creator of USDe, a synthetic dollar protocol built on Ethereum. USDe aims to provide a stable and scalable form of money within the crypto-native space, independent of traditional banking systems. ENA is Ethena's native utility token, serving governance functions that allow holders to vote on protocol decisions.

EtherFi is a decentralized finance (DeFi) platform focused on providing Ethereum staking services. It enables users to stake their Ether (ETH) and participate in the network's consensus mechanism, earning rewards in return. ETHFI is the native token of the EtherFi platform, used to facilitate staking operations and governance activities. Key Features of ETHFI: Staking Services: ETHFI allows users to stake their Ether, contributing to the security and decentralization of the Ethereum network while earning staking rewards. Platform Governance: Holders of ETHFI tokens can participate in governance decisions, influencing the future direction and features of the EtherFi platform.

Aevo is a decentralized derivatives trading platform offering perpetual contracts for various cryptocurrencies. It provides users with advanced trading features, including high leverage and a wide range of trading pairs. AEVO is the native token of the Aevo platform, used for governance, staking, and accessing premium features. Key Features of AEVO: Derivatives Trading: Aevo enables users to trade perpetual contracts with competitive fees and efficient execution, catering to both novice and professional traders. Staking and Rewards: AEVO token holders can stake their tokens to earn rewards and participate in the platform's growth.

Plume (PLUME) is a public Layer 1 blockchain platform designed to integrate real-world assets (RWAs) into the blockchain space. It supports a variety of investments, including art and green energy projects, offering fast transactions and low fees. (cryptorank.io)

Bio Protocol (BIO) is a decentralized platform designed to accelerate biotech research through collective funding and tokenization of projects and intellectual property in the biotech field. It allows patients, scientists, and professionals in biotechnology to collaboratively invest in decentralized science (DeSci) initiatives. (cryptoslate.com)

• The project is centered around lending and liquidity pools within the framework of decentralized finance (DeFi) applications, operated through a decentralized governance system managed by users. The use of the project's token (WLFI) is exclusively limited to protocol governance and decision-making.
MEME COIN
MEME COIN
MEME COIN

GoPlus Security (GPS) is a decentralized security platform designed to enhance the safety of Web3 applications and users across various blockchain networks. It offers AI-driven security solutions and an Automated Verification System (AVS) to assess and mitigate risks in real-time.
MEME COIN

Flock.io (FLOCK) is a decentralized platform leveraging blockchain technology to transform the development, training, and deployment of artificial intelligence (AI) models through federated learning and decentralized frameworks. (flock.io)

Horizen (ZEN) is a decentralized platform focused on privacy, using blockchain technology to ensure the privacy of transactions and communications. It was created as a fork of ZClassic, which in turn is a fork of ZCash, a well-known cryptocurrency emphasizing privacy. (binance.com)

Zcash (ZEC) is a cryptocurrency that emphasizes privacy and transparency, allowing users to choose between transparent and shielded transactions. It operates on a blockchain similar to Bitcoin's, with a fixed supply of 21 million coins.
